Hi, I am have used a method in the past with version 1.12 of Heritrix
where=
 if you add a Beanshell processor after the pre-processor and
reset any Cra=
wlURI status to unattempted for images that were blocked
by robots.txt.  Th=
is allows ignoring robots.txt only for some file
types.  This works great i=
n v1.12 and I have upgraded to v2.0.1 and
I'm pretty sure I have duplicated=

images are still being blocked.  Any help =
is appreciated.

And this i=
s the Beanshell script:

--
import org.archive.crawler.datamodel.*;
import =
org.archive.modules.fetcher.FetchStatusCodes;

process(CrawlURI curi) {
   =
curi.setFetchStatus(FetchStatusCodes.S_UNATTEMPTED);
}


Have I missed anyt=
hing ?
